data.TX_RESULT_WAITING_LABEL: This transaction is waiting on action
data.PERSISTENCE_CHECKBOX: Remember this on my device next time
data.HOME_EMPTY_HEADER: There are no transactions in your Signer at this time
data.HOME_EMPTY_SUBHEADING: Initiate a transaction from MyCrypto.com to see it appear here
data.UNLOCK_SUBHEADING: Your MyCrypto Signer is currently locked. Enter your MyCrypto Password to unlock it.
data.KEYSTORE_UPLOAD_PART2: or drop your keystore file here
data.NEW_USER_DESCRIPTION_1: This is a transaction signer that was designed to help you safely approve and sign crypto transactions.
data.NEW_USER_DESCRIPTION_2: In order to keep you secure, you need to create a password that will unlock the app moving forward and protect your info.
data.NEW_USER_DESCRIPTION_3: Keep this password safe. **You will not be able to reset or recover this password if you lose it.**
data.CREATE_PASSWORD_DESCRIPTION_1: This code word encrypts your data within the MyCrypto Desktop Signer application. **Choose a strong but easy-to-remember code word and do not forget it. It's not recoverable.** This code word will allow you to sign transactions.
data.CREATE_PASSWORD_DESCRIPTION_2: After creating your password, please make sure you put it safely back in storage. [Read more]($link)
data.SECRET_WARNING: After entering your key, please make sure you put it safely back in storage. [Read more]($link)
data.ADD_ACCOUNT_END_BODY_1: You have successfully added your address(es) to the Signer. Next, you must add this/these addresses to your dashboard at app.mycrypto.com.
data.ADD_ACCOUNT_END_BODY_2: Return to the browser window where you launched the Signer to complete this next step.
data.GENERATE_ACCOUNT_MNEMONIC: Create an Account using a Mnemonic Phrase
data.SETUP_ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION: You have successfully created your MyCrypto Password. This code word will allow you to sign transactions. Now it's time to add your account.
data.MNEMONIC_DESCRIPTION_2: Back it up on paper or a USB drive
data.MNEMONIC_DESCRIPTION_3: Can be written, printed, and easily typed on mobile
data.MNEMONIC_DESCRIPTION_4: Compatible with MetaMask, Jaxx, imToken, and more
data.MNEMONIC_DESCRIPTION_5: Provides unlimited addresses for sending and receiving
data.CREATE_MNEMONIC_PHRASE_DESCRIPTION: Write these words down. **Do not** copy them to your clipboard, or save them anywhere online.
data.VERIFY_MNEMONIC_PHRASE_DESCRIPTION: Three of the words in your mnemonic phrase are randomly displayed below. To verify your phrase, fill in the single words that are in those exact positions.
data.WHAT_IS_NTH_WORD: What is the **$nth word** of your phrase?
data.NOT_NTH_WORD: Please enter the $nth word of your phrase.
data.PAPER_WALLET_DESCRIPTION: Your paper wallet includes everything you need to access this account in the future. [**Keep it safe!** No one can recover this account should you lose your recovery phrase.] [Read more]($link)
data.PAPER_WALLET_PRINTED: My Phrase is on Paper and Stored Safely
data.BLOCKIE_NOTICE: Always look for this icon when sending to this wallet
data.RESET_HEADING: Are you sure you want to reset your password?
data.RESET_DESCRIPTION: Resetting your password will cause you to lose all your saved settings (accounts, saved keys, & transactions).
data.RESET_CANCEL: No, I want to keep my settings
data.SIGNING_WITH_NON_PERSISTED_ACCOUNT_HEADE: You are Signing a Transaction from a Non Persisted Account
data.SIGNING_WITH_NON_PERSISTED_ACCOUNT_BODY: Enter your secret below to sign the transaction.
data.CONFIRM_ACCOUNT_DELETION: Are you sure you want to delete “$label” account with address $address?
data.PERMISSION_LIST_1: View the addresses of your accounts (required)
data.CONTINUE_ADD_ACCOUNT: My Phrase is Stored Safely, Add Account
data.ADD_ACCOUNT_SECURITY_TITLE: Addressing Security for The MyCrypto Signer
data.ADD_ACCOUNT_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION_1: Storing an account within this application will **ONLY** store the private key for that respective account.
data.ADD_ACCOUNT_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION_2: This application does **NOT** store any mnemonic phrases.
data.ADD_ACCOUNT_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION_3: If you lose your private key or mnemonic phrase for any account, there is no recovery option.
data.ADD_ACCOUNT_SECURITY_DESCRIPTION_4: If you lose the password to this application, you will need to re-import your account(s) via backups that you've saved elsewhere.
data.BACKUP_MNEMONIC_PHRASE: Before continuing, ensure that you backup the secret phrase for your new wallet to reduce your risk of loss. If you'd like, download/print your paper wallet below. [Read more]($link)
data.BACKUP_PRIVATE_KEY: Before continuing, ensure that you backup the private key for this wallet* to reduce the risk of loss. If you'd like, download/print your paper wallet below. [Read more]($link)
data.BACKUP_PRIVATE_KEY_NOTE: *Note that this is only the private key for this individual wallet, this is NOT a mnemonic phrase backup for multiple wallets.
data.ADD_ADDRESS_TO_SIGNER: Add Your Address to the Signer
data.SELECT_ADDRESSES_TO_ADD: Select all addresses you would like to add.
data.NONCE_CHANGED_CONTENT: This transaction had the same nonce as a previously sent transaction. We've changed it for you, but you may edit it if you need to, using the pencil icon below.
data.NONCE_CONFLICT_IN_QUEUE: Nonce is used in another transaction
data.NONCE_CHANGED_HELP: This transaction had the same nonce as a previously sent transaction. We’ve changed it for you, but you may edit it if you need to using the pencil icon above.
data.NONCE_OUT_OF_ORDER: Approving TX out of order affects nonce
data.NONCE_OUT_OF_ORDER_CONTENT: Nonces have be pre-assigned by app.mycrypto.com. You may approve/deny the transactions out of order, but all transactions initiated after this one will be automatically denied.
data.KEEP_THIS_SAFE: Keep this safe. Do not share.
data.IDENTICON_DESCRIPTION: This image is associated with your address. Always look for this icon when sending funds to this wallet.
data.SHARE_WITH_YOUR_FRIENDS: Share this with your friends when they need to send you crypto!
data.KEEP_PRIVATE: **For your eyes only**: keep this private
data.CANT_FIND_ADDRESS: Can't find the address you're looking for?
data.USE_FINDETH: You may be able to use [FindETH]($link) with your Extended Key (below) to find your address.
data.NOT_RAW_TRANSACTION: The transaction is not a valid raw transaction
data.MANUALLY_LOAD_TRANSACTION_DESCRIPTION: This page allows you to paste an Unsigned Raw Transaction in hexadecimal format (i.e., characters 0-9, a-f) and sign it using your private key.
